title: Diploma in Advances in Welding and Joining Technologies
headline: Free online course on advanced welding technology and the fundamentals of welding metallurgy processes.
description: In this free online Advanced Welding Technology course, you will learn about the fundamentals of welding metallurgy which has to do with the classification of the welding processes, alongside the types of welding processes and classification of joints. This course will also teach you about brazing and the principles of brazing, which will lead you into soldering and adhesive bonding, and lastly, solidification and cracking in welding processes.
courseDescription:
This free Advanced Welding Technology online course will help you better understand welding processes and joining technologies. You will be introduced to the fundamentals of welding metallurgy, where you will learn about the different weld techniques and how you can apply them. Also, you will learn about the metallurgy processes of welding and how you can utilize it to perfect your skills. This course will also teach you how you can use arc welding power sources in welding.

This free online course on Advanced Welding Technology will also teach you the differences between brazing and welding processes . You will learn about the principles of brazing and how you can apply it on your own to achieve your perfect weld. You will also learn about the advantages and limitations of soldering, which will equip you with the knowledge in the dos and don'ts during your welding processes. Moving on, you will learn about the best method of application of your adhesive bonding to your welds and joints.

Furthermore, in this course, you will learn about the chemical reactions in welding and its relevance towards perfecting your welding skills. This free online certification course will also teach you the best way to go about your weld when it is in a solid-state to prevent cracking in your welding. Upon the completion of this course, you will have a strong knowledge and better understanding of welding processes and welding metallurgy, thereby you can become a better welder. Grab this opportunity now and begin this free online course in Advanced Welding Technology and obtain your welding certificate.
